  • Constructor Details

    • VoltageScrollbar

      public VoltageScrollbar​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String displayName, VoltageModule module)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      name - internal name of the control
      displayName - display name of the control.
      module - the module this belongs to.

    • VoltageScrollbar

      public VoltageScrollbar​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String displayName, VoltageModule module, boolean bVertical, boolean bAutoHide)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      name - internal name of the control
      displayName - display name of the control.
      module - the module this belongs to.
      bVertical - set to true to make it a vertical scrollbar.
      bAutoHide - set to true to not show the scrollbar if the range is less than the size of the scrollbar.

    • VoltageScrollbar

      public VoltageScrollbar​(java.lang.String name, VoltageModule module)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      name - internal name of the control
      module - the module this belongs to.

    • VoltageScrollbar

      public VoltageScrollbar​(java.lang.String name, VoltageModule module, boolean bVertical, boolean bAutoHide)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      name - internal name of the control
      module - the module this belongs to.
      bVertical - set to true to make it a vertical scrollbar.
      bAutoHide - set to true to not show the scrollbar if the range is less than the size of the scrollbar.

  • Method Details

    • GetPosition

      public int GetPosition()
      Returns the position of the scroll bar.
      Returns:
      the position

    • GetRangeStart

      public int GetRangeStart()
      Returns the start value of the range.
      Returns:
      the range start.

    • GetRangeEnd

      public int GetRangeEnd()
      Returns the end value of the range.
      Returns:
      the range end.

    • GetThumbSize

      public int GetThumbSize()
      Returns the size of the thumb.
      Returns:
      the thumb's size. The thumb will get smaller as the range gets bigger than the size of the scrollbar.

    • GetSingleStepSize

      public int GetSingleStepSize()
      Get the single step increment amount.
      Returns:
      the size of a single step.

    • SetRange

      public void SetRange​(int low, int high)
      Set the scrollbar range.
      Parameters:
      low - the lower end of the range.
      high - the high end of the range.

    • SetThumbSize

      public void SetThumbSize​(int zeThumbSize)
      Set the thumb size.
      Parameters:
      zeThumbSize - the size of the thumb.

    • SetSingleStepSize

      public void SetSingleStepSize​(int newStepSize)
      Set the single step size. When clicking in the areas next to the thumb, this will increment the scoll position by this amount.
      Parameters:
      newStepSize - the step size to increment the scrollbar when clicking.

    • ScrollTo

      public void ScrollTo​(int newValue)
      Scroll to a position.
      Parameters:
      newValue - the new scroll position.

    • SetThumbColor

      public void SetThumbColor​(int red, int green, int blue, int alpha)
      Set the thumb's color.
      Parameters:
      red - (0-255)
      green - (0-255)
      blue - (0-255)
      alpha - (0-255)

    • SetBackgroundColor

      public void SetBackgroundColor​(int red, int green, int blue, int alpha)
      Set the background color of the scrollbar.
      Parameters:
      red - (0-255)
      green - (0-255)
      blue - (0-255)
      alpha - (0-255)

    • SetThumbCornerSize

      public void SetThumbCornerSize​(double cornerSize)
      Set the corner size for the scrollbar thumb.
      Parameters:
      cornerSize - 0 - would be no corners.
